Sentencas: Oxide-ion conductors are used in sensors, oxygen pumps and solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Oxygen exchange behaviour and electrical conductivity of polycrystalline oxide-ion conductors based on Ce1-nLanO2-0.5n

Sentencas: However, their range of application is limited by a low oxide-ion conductivity in the solid electrolyte presently commercially available.
Titulo: Oxygen exchange behaviour and electrical conductivity of polycrystalline oxide-ion conductors based on Ce1-nLanO2-0.5n

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity and the oxygen exchange behaviour of polycrystalline ceria-lanthania specimens with different grain boundary areas have been studied in an attempt to improve the grain boundary conductivity.
Titulo: Oxygen exchange behaviour and electrical conductivity of polycrystalline oxide-ion conductors based on Ce1-nLanO2-0.5n

Sentencas: The results show that a large increase in the grain boundary conductivity was obtained.
Titulo: Oxygen exchange behaviour and electrical conductivity of polycrystalline oxide-ion conductors based on Ce1-nLanO2-0.5n

Sentencas: The thermodynamic properties of the oxygen nonstoichiometric defect reaction of Ce1-nLanO2-0.5n-x solid solutions were measured by coulometric oxygen titration.
Titulo: Oxygen exchange behaviour and electrical conductivity of polycrystalline oxide-ion conductors based on Ce1-nLanO2-0.5n
